channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Quantum Witch’ Review: A Malevolent Deity And Pesky Sheep Run Riot
item.description: Quantum Witch is a choose your own adventure style indie game where what you do with your words matters more than what you do with your fists.

item.title: Magpie Games Announces Partnership With Bestselling Author Naomi Novik

item.title: To Lower Emissions, Airlines Turn To Used Cooking Oil
item.description: Alternative aviation fuels face scale challenges and debate over what sources are sustainable or not

item.title: Latest Leak Reveals Pixel 10 Pro Fold Upgrade
item.description: Ahead of an expected launch in late August, Google is taking steps to make the Pixel 10 Pro Fold as attractive to consumers as possible.

item.title: Millions Of Hogs,Millions With No Clean Water, How The EPA Failed Iowa
item.description: Millions of Hogs, Millions Without Clean Water, Or What Happens When EPA Fails Flyover Country
